original_text: The Philistines had a strong, brave soldier. His name was Goliath and he came from a town called Gath. He was nearly three metres tall!
korean_text: 블레셋 사람들의 진영에서 싸움을 돋우는 자가 왔는데 그의 이름은 골리앗이요 가드 사람이라 그의 키는 여섯 규빗 한 뼘이요

sentences.original_text: The Philistines had a strong, brave soldier.
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람들은 강하고 용감한 병사를 가지고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and he came from a town called Gath.
He was nearly three metres tall!
